name: Marco Carbone
content: Marco Carbone - IT-University of Copenhagen Marco Carbone Professor, Theoretical Computer ScienceProgramming Logic and SemanticsCenter for Information Security and TrustHead of Programme, MSc in Computer Science https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9479-2632 Emailmacaitudk 20072025 Research activity per year Personal profile Curriculum Interests in Theoretical and Practical aspects of Web Services, Concurrency, Static Analyses, Security and Trust Based Systems. In particular, contributions on Session Types and Chore- ography for Web Services, Security and Expressivity of languages for concurrency resulting into several peer-reviewed publications in international journals and conferences. http://www.itu.dk/people/maca/cv.pdf KeywordsSemanticsWeb servicesSession typesConcurrency theoryConcurrent software Verification Fingerprint Dive into the research topics where Marco Carbone is active.
